r.d:
+ An interface for maintaining credential caches (KRB5CCache), that can be used for authenticating against a kerberos5 realm + Bindings for nearly the complete GSSAPI (RFC2744) + The administrative interface (KADM5) + Support for HTTP Negotiate authentication via GSSAPI
Documentation: + see docs/ for the API documentation + there are several pieces of example code in the examples/ directory + see below for install instructions
r.n: - [BUG] Keep proper minor status for error reporting in initSecContex - [BUG] remove some overlooked debugging output - [BUG] fix PECL package license metadata - [FEATURE] Add API for password expiration information (MIT >=1.9 only) - [FEATURE] Allow leaving the NegotiateAuth SPN unspecified (allow all from keytab) - [FEATURE] Add support for gss_acquire_cred_from() instead of setting the per process keytab (in NegotiateAuth, GSSAPI to follow). - [FEATURE] Allow overriding SPN for NegotiateAuth.
